meanings.definition: The state or quality of being clean.
meanings.sent1: Her room sparkled with cleanliness after she finished tidying up.
meanings.sent2: Good cleanliness is important for preventing the spread of germs.
meanings.sent3: The cleanliness of his car was so impressive that his friends joked he must never drive it.
meanings.sent4: The cleanliness of the hospital was like a beacon of hope in a sea of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The cleanliness of the freshly fallen snow was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The habit or practice of keeping oneself or one's surroundings clean.
meanings.sent1: Her dedication to cleanliness meant she never left dirty dishes in the sink.
meanings.sent2: Regular cleanliness routines can help maintain a healthy living environment.
meanings.sent3: His commitment to cleanliness was so strong that he even organized his sock drawer by color.
meanings.sent4: The cleanliness of her mind reflected in the orderliness of her desk.
meanings.sent5: The cleanliness of the garden was a testament to the hard work of the gardener.
